result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marvell G. Lynch

records.addlTxt:
1:40 PM Attorney Drew Lehman in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Marvell G. Lynch in court, in custody.  Attorney Chad A Shamali in court for Marvell G. Lynch. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CF373/22CM376/22CM396. Victim rights compliance. Matter is still not resolved. Discussion held; Court is unavailable the week of 10/17/22. Court will reschedule matter for trial. Ludwig hearing to be held at next hearing.
Jury status hearing scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 01:30 pm.
Jury selection scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 08:30 am.
State's List of Witnesses and Demand for Discovery

10:08 AM   State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman. Defendant, Marvell G. Lynch, appeared in custody with Attorney Chad A Shamali.   Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES:   22CF373/22CM376/22CM396. Victim rights compliance. Attorney Shamali advises the Court that he just received an offer from the State and the DE will not accept the offer. Attorney Shamali is requesting the matter be set for trial. Parties receive scheduling order in court today.  Jury status hearing scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury selection scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of assignment of judge returned. Moved, left no address. Unable to forward. Return to Sender.

Defendant Marvell G. Lynch appeared with Attorney Chad A Shamali.  Defendant in custody.   Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  Case heard with 22CF373 today.  Not guilty plea entered by the Court.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

01:30 PM    Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Chad Shamali.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Further proceedings scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Bond continued.  ts
filed by Atty. Chad Shamali  kmk
